## Introduction

- This app allows a user to see the average energy use intensity (EUI) for a given building type and a given use type.
- The EUI is the energy used to operate a building. This would usually involve electric appliances, gas heating, building mechanical systems, etc.
- The City of Minneapolis has made this available for the years 2014-17 
- The data can be downloaded here: http://www.minneapolismn.gov/environment/energy/benchmarking

## How to use the app

- Select the building type from the drop-down:private or public
- Select the building-use type from the drop-down
- Options for public buildings are: school, office, parking, other
- Options for private buildings are: office, parking, hotel and multi-use assembly
- The app will show the average EUI for each year for that a particular bulding type and use-type
